ISSUE.TITLE: Document support for `auth_required` in PluginMenuItem
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Change Type Addition ### Area Plugins ### Proposed Changes FR #18529 introduces experimental support for the `auth_required` attribute on the PluginMenuItem class. This should be documented as a supported feature of the NetBox v4.3 plugins API.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Closes #18541: Document support for auth_required attribute on PluginMenuItem
Closes #18541: Document support for auth_required attribute on PluginMenuItem
